alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 9:45PM EDT until May 28 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Perdido River Near Barrineau Park affecting Baldwin and Escambia Counties. For the Perdido River...including Barrineau Park...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Perdido River Near Barrineau Park. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River begins to leave its banks at the parking lot of Adventures Perdido River. Begins to threaten several permanently parked travel trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.7 feet Friday morning. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
